channel.title: Need a Web-Designer/Developer
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape and all theese Smexy Beetches Outside. I need a WepDeveloper/Designer , Idk wut a designer or developer is so im using both.
My Friend made me a MyBB Forums with NeonGlow theme from PixelMonkey. Normally it costs 20$ But he got it for free i dont know how. i want a nice one , not a downloaded shit , so yea. Add me on Skype ! Username: Lirimoo Im not going to say a Price cause we cant handle anything out on Mopar , so we will do it on Skype. Comment here or add me on Skype.
If you can make some smexy ones , use this.
[code]Can you make MyBB or SMF Forums , If yes which: Can you make Banners/Logos, If yes show me a example of yours: Show me a example of a MyBB or SMF Forums you made , and Logo or Banner:[/code]

item.title: Need a Web-Designer/Developer
item.dc:creator: @V_1_N_C_H V 1 N C H
item.description:
@V_1_N_C_H wrote:

I have a nulled IPB 3.3.4, I can put it up for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Web-Designer/Developer
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:23, topic:471553”]I always thought there was a rule against the discussion and distribution of nulled goods.[/quote]This is why I am not giving him it, nor telling him where to get it on these forums.

[quote=“Lirimoo, post:22, topic:471553”]#NULLED = IFIGETCATCHEDIMloveED.
Get me a nulled one. :3[/quote]
If you can make a good/beastly server. You’ll only need a nulled one till the members donate to get the real ones. I will not tell you/give you nulled ones on these forums. However. You can add my skype below and we’ll chat from there.

Read full topic

[/quote]

You will get caught[/quote]

item.title: Need a Web-Designer/Developer
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:10, topic:471553”][quote author=sppt link=topic=589147.msg4175312#msg4175312 date=1354927244]

If you think that vBulletin or IPB are outweighing the speed and user-friendliness of SMF then you have some serious issues.

SMF and high speed?
Did you forget the times where banning a single person would pretty much DoS the forums for like 30 mins?
[/quote]

Wasn’t that fixed?[/quote]
Yeah, but what I’m saiyan is that SMF isn’t particularly well known for it’s speed, at least, not to me

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Web-Designer/Developer
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“sppt, post:8, topic:471553”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=589147.msg4175211#msg4175211 date=1354915010]
If you think that vBulletin or IPB are outweighing the speed and user-friendliness of SMF then you have some serious issues.
[/quote]
SMF and high speed?
Did you forget the times where banning a single person would pretty much DoS the forums for like 30 mins?[/quote]
That was fixed I thought, I haven’t had to moderate or administrate SMF forums for a while. You can’t argue the user-friendliness though. Either way, that was in the past. SMF’s benchmarks are pretty impressive.

Also @oldschool-scape there is no built in portal for IPB or VB they’re both third party mods as far as I know. SMF has a third party site which offers EzPortal which you could install as you would with the other portals.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Web-Designer/Developer
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:6, topic:471553”]Ye what i ment to say, Get a better forum Like Ipboard vbulletin or smf, (Me myself uses SMF for now, its realy good, but what i miss, is the build in Portal (I know there are plugins) and more customize stuff with the navbar…

I’m not saying Smf is bad.
I’m just saying IPboard or Vbulletin are more advanced in my opinion… easyer to use[/quote]

You can do whatever you want with SMF. There are no restrictions, it’s totally open-source.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:3, topic:471553”]MyBB sucks, if u get a cheap one, get SMF

Or if u want to go Pro (What players like more then cheap freeby forums)
Get Vbulletin or Ipboard

And for making forums u dont need Web-Developers/designers…
Even a retard can make sections in forums… stop being Lazy and put some effort in your server.

I Dont even wanna help you, if you dont even help yourself or try…[/quote]

SMF is definitively superior to almost all forum-software.

Read full topic
